recipe.title: How to Make Japanese Curry
recipe.intro: Japanese curry is a thick and warm dish. Many Japanese people love it with rice.
recipe.ingredients: beef or chicken, potato, carrot, onion, curry roux, water, vegetable oil
steps: **Cut** the meat, potato, carrot, and onion into small pieces.
**Heat** oil in a big pot on medium heat.
**Cook** the onion until it is soft and light brown.
**Add** the meat, potato, and carrot and cook for three minutes.
**Pour** water into the pot and cook for twenty minutes.
**Add** the curry roux and stir until the sauce is thick. **Enjoy!**

review.content: I went to Lavender Hill Cafe on a sunny Sunday. It was near Coogee Beach. The walls were painted in soft lavender. I sat by the window and watched the waves. I had Japanese curry with rice. It was thick and very warm. The cafe was small and cozy. Soft music was playing. I wanted to stay there all day.

australia_tips.title: オーストラリアでカレーを作るなら
australia_tips.content:
日本のカレールーはオーストラリアのアジア食材店で買えます。ColesやWoolworthsのアジア食材コーナーにも置いてあることがあります。「Japanese curry roux」で探してみましょう。バーモントカレーやジャワカレーなど、日本でおなじみのブランドが見つかります。

じゃがいも（potato）、にんじん（carrot）、たまねぎ（onion）はどのスーパーでも安く買えます。オーストラリアの牛肉（beef）は質が良くて値段も手頃です。「diced beef」（角切り牛肉）を買うとカレーにぴったりです。

Coogee Beachはシドニーの東にある美しいビーチです。BondiからCoogeeまでの海沿いの散歩道「Coastal Walk」は絶景スポットです。歩いた後に温かいカレーを食べるのは最高ですね。

シェアハウスでカレーを作ると、いい香りが家中に広がります。ハウスメイトに「Do you want some curry?」と声をかけてみましょう。カレーは世界中で人気なので、きっと喜ばれますよ。

conversation.scene: スーパーマーケットで、友達のMiaと一緒にカレーの材料を買う場面

lines.speaker: A
lines.text: Mia, I want to make Japanese curry tonight. Can you help me find the things?

lines.speaker: A
lines.text: We need potatoes, carrots, onions, and beef.

lines.speaker: B
lines.text: OK, the vegetables are over there. How many potatoes?

lines.speaker: A
lines.text: Two big ones, please. And three carrots.

lines.speaker: B
lines.text: Got it. Where is the beef?

lines.speaker: A
lines.text: It is near the back of the store. I need diced beef.

lines.speaker: A
lines.text: I need curry roux. It is in the Asian food section.

lines.speaker: A
lines.text: Yes, that is the one. Thank you!

lines.speaker: B
lines.text: Japanese curry smells so good. I cannot wait for dinner!
